thread.section_title: Grand Hyatt Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: F4803TEdavidg
title: Great hotel
text: Overall amazing location near Tianan'men Square, National Museum, Forbidden City, Wangfujing Street, and central in the city with access to the Temple of Heaven, Olympic Stadia, Hutong, Housing lakes and nearby gardens. Service, by US hospitality standards, leaves a bit to be desired but this is fairly true across a lot of establishments in Beijing. It doesn't compare to Singapore or Hong Kong. The group tour to the Great Wall was excellent--recommend Mutianyu.
